#Problem 1

_Q1: How many aisles are there, and which aisles are the most items ordered from?_

```{r}
aisles_count =
  instacart %>%
  count(aisle, sort=TRUE)

aisles_count
```

There are 134 aisles in the instacart dataset, fresh vegatables have the most times, which is 150609
